attributes.name: Ember.SubArray
attributes.description: An Ember.SubArray tracks an array in a way similar to, but more specialized than, Ember.TrackedArray. It is useful for keeping track of the indexes of items within a filtered array.

methods.description: Track that an item was added to the tracked array.
methods.name: addItem

params.name: index
params.description: The index of the item in the tracked array.

params.name: match
params.description: `true` iff the item is included in the subarray.

return.description: The index of the item in the subarray.

methods.description: Track that an item was removed from the tracked array.
methods.name: removeItem

params.name: index
params.description: The index of the item in the tracked array.

return.description:
The index of the item in the subarray, or `-1` if the item
was not in the subarray.
